subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Organizing Hackathon by NHAl Innovation Task Force -reg.

No. 285311)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Organizing Hackathon by NHAI Innovation Task Force -reg: NHAI HQ has constituted an Innovation Task Force vide order dated 23.05.2025 (Annexure-I) for Organizing monthly Hackathons For this purpose, following SOP has been approved: 1 The problem Statement in the prescribed Format, enclosed at Annexure-Il, shall be submitted by the various Divisions at NHAI HQ as well as Field Units to the Innovation Task Force. ji. The problem Statement shall be examined by the Task Force for its suitability for Hackathon. If found suitable, the same shall be published through Media Wing of NHAI on the NHAI Website/ Social Media Platforms etc. iii. Registration mechanism of the participating Teams shall be developed by the IT of NHAI: iv. After completion of the deadline, the submitted proposals by the participants shall be forwarded to the Task Force by the Media/ IT Division of NHAI. V The Jury for evaluation of the proposals shall be the Members of Innovation Task Force, CGM/ GM of the concerned Division who has submitted the problem Statement and any other Member assigned by the Competent Authority. vi. The maximum number of Winners shall be three (03) and the Prize Money for 1st 2nd and 3rd Position shall be Rs. 2.00 lakhs, Rs. 1.00 lakhs and Rs. 0.50 Lakhs respectively. vii. All submitted solutions will be evaluated by a Jury on a Scale of 100 Marks, based on the following Parameters a. Innovation Level 30 Marks b Feasibility 30 Marks C. Scalability & Sustainability 20 Marks d. Presentation & Documentation 20 Marks viii. The Result shall be declared by the Jury through Digital means (NHAI Website, Social Media etc.) Contd__2I- '# 7 7 9 NHAI Wing
